entities.name: kingsley
entities.description: Kingsley is mentioned as the one who saved them with his warning. ("Well, Kingsley saved us")

entities.name: ron's dad
entities.description: Ron's dad is mentioned as the one who told them that the family was safe. ("Ron's dad told us the family were safe")

entities.name: lupin
entities.description: Lupin is mentioned as the one who said Kingsley saved them. ("Well, Kingsley saved us," said Lupin)

entities.name: death eaters
entities.description: Death Eaters are mentioned as a possible group that could have been involved. ("Were they Death Eaters or Ministry people?")

entities.name: ministry people
entities.description: Ministry people are mentioned as another possible group that could have been involved. ("Were they Death Eaters or Ministry people?")

relationships.description: Kingsley saved them from the Death Eaters. ("Well, Kingsley saved us")
